name: SnaileeYo!
description:
Enter the world of SnaileeYo! a cute & marvelous universe where you slide, fly, fall (a lot), grow really huge (with surprise leaf powers), & much more!

Play as SnaileeYo!--the cutest gastropod--& navigate different worlds, running from enemies (deflecting them with fire balls or tricking them with decoy powers), crossing bridges, blocks, islands, & munching on leaves as you race to the finish line before time runs out.

"A platform game with a snail... But snails can't jump!" you say? That's exactly right, which makes SnaileeYo! a much more challenging, unique & fun adventure. Instead of jumping, you will have to build your skills & mastery moving SnaileeYo! Find special leaf powers to grow, fly, launch fire balls, wear armor, & lay decoys to cross from platform to platform.

In this colorful world, the enemies are pretty mean (but also cute), so they will instantly bump SnaileeYo! off platforms, but don't worry: SnaileeYo!'s everyday protective shell offers you infinite game continues, and your game saves at every level!

Have fun, stay safe, and be zen, yo!
